remark.en: Please check with adviser for taking the curriculum
remark.ch: 請務必找到指導教授後，方可修此課程。

goal.en: "To help students clarify their own interest in the field of expertise, to let students develop the ability of independent research, and to guide students in the research direction of thesis."
goal.ch: 透過討論，協助學生釐清自己有興趣之領域專長，養成學生獨立研究的能力，並引導確立學位論文之方向。

1 Literature survey –related literature study
2 Literature survey –related literature study
3 Literature survey –related literature study

15 Thesis organization- Construction of tesearch methodology
16 Thesis organization- Construction of Research Methodology
17 Thesis organization- Construction of Research Methodology
18 Thesis organization- Construction of Research Methodology"
